title: Ticket #5873: condor_submit should not insert windows OSVERSIONINFO by default
description:
condor_submit should not publish the windows OSVERSIONINFO attributes into each job by default.

The following attributes will no longer be published into every job submitted from windows by default. 

    WindowsMajorVersion
    WindowsMinorVersion
    WindowsBuildNumber
    WindowsServicePackMajorVersion
    WindowsServicePackMinorVersion
    WindowsProductType

A new knob will be added to allow for this behaviour to be optionally enabled (in case anyone cares...) 

    SUBMIT_PUBLISH_WINDOWS_OSVERSIONINFO

This knob will default to false.
